text: varini adugu: "Miru allah ku sati kalpincukunna varilo satyam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cesevadu, evadaina unnada?" Inka ila anu: "Kevalam allah ye satyam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cesevadu. Emi? Satyam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cesevadu vidheyataku ekkuva ar'huda? Leka margadarsakatvam ceyabaditene tappa svayanga sanmargam pondaleni vada? Ayite mikemayindi? Mirelanti nirnayalu tisukuntunnaru
